title: Temporal Data Meets LLM -- Explainable Financial Time Series Forecasting. (arXiv:2306.11025v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: This paper presents a novel study on harnessing Large Language Models' (LLMs) outstanding knowledge and reasoning abilities for explainable financial time series forecasting. The application of machine learning models to financial time series comes with several challenges, including the difficulty in cross-sequence reasoning and inference, the hurdle of incorporating multi-modal signals from historical news, financial knowledge graphs, etc., and the issue of interpreting and explaining the model results. In this paper, we focus on NASDAQ-100 stocks, making use of publicly accessible historical stock price data, company metadata, and historical economic/financial news. We conduct experiments to illustrate the potential of LLMs in offering a unified solution to the aforementioned challenges. translated_title: 时间数据遇上LLM——可解释的金融时间序列预测
translated_abstract: 本文提出了一种新颖的研究方法，利用大型语言模型的杰出知识和推理能力，对可解释的金融时间序列预测进行了探究。使用机器学习模型进行金融时间序列预测存在诸多挑战，包括跨序列推理和推断的困难、将历史新闻、金融知识图谱等多模态信号纳入模型的难度，以及模型结果的解释和说明问题。为此，本文以纳斯达克100股票为例，利用公开可获取的历史股价数据、公司元数据以及历史经济/金融新闻进行了实验，以说明LLM在提供上述挑战的统一解决方案方面的潜力。我们的实验包括使用GPT-4进行零样本/少样本推断以及使用公共LLM模型Open LLaMA进行指令式微调等方面。实验结果表明，我们的方法优于一些基线模型。
tldr: 本文提出利用大型语言模型进行可解释的金融时间序列预测的方法，并在纳斯达克100股票上进行了实验，结果表明该方法优于基线模型。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a novel method for explainable financial time series forecasting using large language models, and conducts experiments on NASDAQ-100 stocks to demonstrate its potential in offering a unified solution to the challenges, outperforming several baselines.
